title: Pokemon Developer Game Freak Suffers Major Hack - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.14.24
description:
Pre-order New World: Aeternum now on PlayStation 5 or Xbox Series X|S to get the Azoth Stalker Wolf Mount and prepare for launch on October 15! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Pokemon developer Game Freak has been hacked, Tim’s Neva review, and a new Destiny game has been revealed.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - our Life is Strange: Double Exposure preview
 - The STREAM is Dragon Ball Sparking Zero w/ Bless and Mike
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway about fictional food
 - And you can get Kinda Funny Podcast this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:05 - Housekeeping
          -  The Roper Report   -
00:08:18 - Game Freak acknowledges massive Pokémon data breach, as employee info appears online
00:17:30 - Neva Review Round Up
00:29:36 - Xbox Partner Preview Coming Thursday
00:35:15 - Destiny: Rising is a new mobile RPG shooter set in Bungie’s Destiny universe
00:42:40 - Rare's Craig Duncan to become head of Xbox Game Studios as Alan Hartman retires
00:47:08 - Three Call of Duty games are coming to Xbox Cloud Gaming on October 25th
00:48:49 - Wee News!
00:55:15 - SuperChats
00:56:26 - You‘re Wrong
